name: kwiki.vim
description: The script is based on the wiki.vim developed by Andreas Kneib <aporia@web.de> and Mathias Panzenb√∂ck <grosser.meister.morti@gmx.at>.  The formatting rules are mainly derived (with modification) from the perl module Kwiki::Formatter. http://search.cpan.org/~ingy/Kwiki-0.39/lib/Kwiki/Formatter.pm
install_details:
Simply drop the file into your syntax directory ($HOME/.vim/syntax) and add one line into your filetype.vim:

    au BufRead,BufNewFile *.kwiki setf kwiki
